column4: hey all, i just built a new kernel, and i'm trying to setup the entry for it in /boot/grub/menu.lst however I don't know what to put in for the initrd field.............all the other kernels on my system have a cooresponding inird.... file, however i can't find one that is associated with the kernel I built.....what am i suppose to put there?
did you use make-kpkg? and if so did you supply the --initrd directive? and if not, did you compile needed items into the kernel, not as modules?
did you add in your ide controller?
do you know what option that might be?
